document.full_text: the tornado that raked joplin, missouri, on sunday was the deadliest single twister in the united states since 1953, putting 2011 on pace for a possible record year for tornado fatalities, weather experts said on monday.
document.title: factbox: 2011 on pace to be deadliest u.s. tornado year
lines_and_colors: the tornado that raked joplin, missouri, on sunday was the deadliest single twister in the united states since 1953, putting 2011 on pace for a possible record year for tornado fatalities, weather experts said on monday.
